f x y

| 6 |  | psraddcl.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |

| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` R ) = ( +g ` R ) |

| 19 | 11, 13, 14, 17, 17, 18 | #P_off | |- ( ph -> ( X oF ( +g ` R ) Y ) : { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } --> ( Base ` R ) ) |

| 21 | 20, 16 | #P_elmap | |- ( ( X oF ( +g ` R ) Y ) e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } ) <-> ( X oF ( +g ` R ) Y ) : { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 22 | 19, 21 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ph -> ( X oF ( +g ` R ) Y ) e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } ) ) |
